import React, { Component } from 'react' import UserDataService from "../api/user/UserDataService"; class UserInfoForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { title:props.title, username: props.user.username, gender: props.user.gender, date: props.user.date, phoneNumber: props.user.phoneNumber, email: props.user.email } } componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) { this.setState({ title:nextProps.title, username: nextProps.user.username, gender: nextProps.user.gender, date: nextProps.user.date, phoneNumber: nextProps.user.phoneNumber, email: nextProps.user.email }) } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } createAccountClicked = () =>{ const status = UserDataService.createUser({ id: 0, username: this.state.username, gender: this.state.gender, date: this.state.date, phoneNumber: this.state.phoneNumber, email: this.state.email}) .then( ()=> this.props.history.push('/search/match') ) } render() { return (

{this.state.title}

) } } export default UserInfoForm
